summary: An Ordinance refunding from Local Improvement Funds of the City of Seattle the amount of three hundred twenty-five and sixteen hundredths (325.16) dollars to Thomas Bowes, said amount having been paid into the City Treasury of the City of Seattle by said Thomas Bowes under mis-apprehension of obligations legally devolving upon him at that time, and declaring the City Treasurer to strike from certain assessment rolls entries of said payments made by said Thomas Bowes.
